name: Yep, It's Another Space Shooter
description:
What, you've made yet another arcade shooter??

Yup! It's a shooter, set in space. Lots of pretty colours. Haven't seen one of those in a while...

Recently moved to a new game engine, GMS2. Tried to remake my very first game, a basic Asteroids clone. This time around I've revamped it with snazzy new polish. 

Controls

W A S D to Move

Mouse to Aim / Fire
